attributes.action: public sector pension funding by the private sector
attributes.additional_details: there is a large amount of private sector workers who cannot afford a pension but they still have to fund public sector pensions through there taxes, this is totally unfair, give the private sector a vote on whether they wish to carry on with the status quo or moving forward bring the public sector in line with the private sector and find and fund there own,lets bring fairness into the provision of pensions in this country and stop the ludicrous situation where the poorest workers in the private sector have to help fund the pensions for the richest workers in the public sector GIVE US A VOTE
